metadata.title: CVE-2022-48724 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/vt-d: Fix potential memory leak in intel_setup_irq_remapping()After commit e3beca48a45b ("irqdomain/treewide: Keep firmware nodeunconditionally allocated"). For tear down scenario, fn is only freedafter fail to allocate ir_domain, though it also should be freed in casedmar_enable_qi returns error.Besides free fn, irq_domain and ir_msi_domain need to be removed as wellif intel_setup_irq_remapping fails to enable queued invalidation.Improve the rewinding path by add out_free_ir_domain and out_free_fwnodelables per Baolu's suggestion.
